mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM notice WHERE notice_type_id = #{noticeTypeId}

SELECT noti.NOTICE_ID, noti.NOTICE_IMG_ID, noti.NOTICE_TYPE_ID, type.NOTICE_TYPE_NAME, noti.NOTICE_TITLE, noti.NOTICE_DATE_CREATED FROM notice noti LEFT OUTER JOIN notice_type type ON (noti.notice_type_id = type.notice_type_id) ORDER BY noti.notice_date_created DESC LIMIT #{perPagePostNo} OFFSET #{startPostNo}

SELECT noti.notice_id, noti.NOTICE_IMG_ID, noti.NOTICE_TYPE_ID, type.notice_type_name, noti.notice_title, noti.notice_date_created FROM notice noti LEFT OUTER JOIN notice_type type ON (noti.notice_type_id = type.notice_type_id) WHERE noti.notice_type_id = #{noticeTypeId} ORDER BY noti.notice_date_created DESC LIMIT #{perPagePostNo} OFFSET #{startPostNo}

SELECT noti.notice_id, noim.NOTICE_IMG_ID, noti.NOTICE_TYPE_ID, type.notice_type_name, noti.notice_title, noti.notice_content, noti.notice_date_created, noim.notice_img_1, noim.notice_img_2, noim.notice_img_3, noim.notice_img_4, noim.notice_img_5 FROM notice noti LEFT OUTER JOIN notice_type type ON (noti.notice_type_id = type.notice_type_id) LEFT OUTER JOIN notice_images noim ON (noti.notice_img_id = noim.notice_img_id) WHERE noti.notice_id = #{noticeId}
SELECT notice_img_id, notice_img_1, notice_img_2, notice_img_3, notice_img_4, notice_img_5 FROM notice_images WHERE notice_img_id = #{noticeImgId}
